about_the_game:
Ready to rise to the ultimate challenge? Oryx 3 awaits with a deadly battle in the revamped Realm Exalt—faster, stronger, and more thrilling than ever! Face the trial of champions with confidence, equipped with the finest trinkets from across the realm. Enhance your skills, dive into the most dangerous dungeons, and secure powerful loot. With extra storage in your Vault Chest and a new Character Slot at the ready, you’ll be well-prepared for every twist of fate!

This pack contains:

  • 2x Vault Chest Unlocker

  • 1x Char Slot Unlocker

  • 1x Class Mystery Skin Chest

  • 1x Sanctified Ambrosia

  • 2x Golden Lucky Clover

  • 3x Aspirant Exalted Mystery Key

  • 1x Mystery ST Chest

Note: All items will be delivered to your Gift Chest in the game after you buy this pack. Please wait a few minutes and re-launch the game to be able to see them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Exalt - Minimum


  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD A10 5700
  • Memory: 8GB RAM
  • Memory: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 250MB available space
  • Resolution: 800x600
  • Avg. FPS: 30
pc_requirements.recommended:
Exalt - Recommended


  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16GB RAM
  • Memory: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (6GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 250MB available space
  • Resolution: 1920x1080
  • Avg. FPS: 60
